_meta.rule: No code handles data unless this file contains real examples of that data.
_meta.commandment: III. Thou Shalt Not Code Without Fixtures

resource_name.description: Real-world examples of this data type

samples.field_name: A very long string that tests the limits of the field...

external_api_data.description: Mock data from external APIs (so we don't hit live APIs during dev)

validation_checklist: All data types in fixtures match schema types
Edge cases are represented (empty strings, nulls, max values)
Fixtures can be used to run tests without network calls
